sys_element_mapping.value:
Hi Trigger - Record Created➛...➛First name,

Your request for 1 - Get Catalog Variables➛...➛Course Name has been approved. Please proceed to book the course at 1 - Get Catalog Variables➛...➛Course URL. when you have completed the training your certificates will be updated.

 

Thanks

 

The Training Team.

comments=Your manager has approved your training request for {{e49309fd-88cd-4140-9219-8d29dd21dd0c.course.course_name}}. You will receive and email shortly with links to confirm the date of your training.
